name: BlockPortal
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
BlockPortal ecosystem consists of several trading, social + community features along with a marketplace. Moreover, the platform will have robust payment automation and peer-to-peer crypto & NFT transfer options.
BlockPortal native token will act asa governance token which will have various use cases as the project evolves. Some of use cases will be premium memberships, marketplace discounts, gaming advantages and much more.
